Class Entity

java.lang.Object
game.characters.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object
Abstract class representing an entity with stats, an attack list, and a unique identifier.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected List<Attack>
    attackList
    A list of attacks available to the entity.
    protected String
    identifier
    The unique string identifier of the entity.
    protected Map<String,Integer>
    stats
    A map containing the stats of the entity, where the key is the stat name and the value is its value.

    Constructs an Entity object by initializing its identifier.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(String newIdentifier)
      Constructs an Entity object by initializing its identifier.
      Parameters:
      newIdentifier - a unique string identifier for the entity.

  • Method Details

    • performAttackTo

      public void performAttackTo(Entity target, Attack attack)
      Calculates damage, reduces the target's health, and updates the battle text area with the turn info.
      Parameters:
      target - the target entity receiving the damage.
      attack - the attack performed by this entity.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Reduces the entity's health based on the damage received.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to be taken.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the entity is dead.
      Returns:
      true if the entity's health is 0 or less, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the entity.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the entity's identifier.

    • setIdentifier

      public void setIdentifier(String newIdentifier)
      Sets the entity's identifier.
      Parameters:
      newIdentifier - the new identifier for the entity.

    • setStats

      public void setStats(Map<String,Integer> newStats)
      Sets the entity's stats.
      Parameters:
      newStats - a map containing the entity's stats.

    • setStatValue

      public void setStatValue(String stat, int newValue)
      Sets the value of a specific stat.
      Parameters:
      stat - the name of the stat to update.
      newValue - the new value for the stat.

    • setAttackList

      public void setAttackList(List<Attack> newAttackList)
      Sets the entity's attack list.
      Parameters:
      newAttackList - a list of attacks available to the entity.

    • getStatValue

      public int getStatValue(String stat)
      Gets the value of a specific stat.
      Parameters:
      stat - the name of the stat to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified stat.

    • getAttackList

      public List<Attack> getAttackList()
      Gets the entity's attack list.
      Returns:
      the list of attacks available to the entity.

    • getStats

      public Map<String,Integer> getStats()
      Gets the entity's stats.
      Returns:
      a map containing the entity's stats.
